titles.title: College Tuition and Debt Relief Act of 2014
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase and extend the American Opportunity Tax Credit and to increase the student loan interest deduction.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/17/2014--Introduced. College Tuition and Debt Relief Act of 2014 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) make permanent the American Opportunity tax credit, (2) increase the allowable amount of such credit and adjust such amount for inflation for taxable years beginning after 2015, and (3) increase the tax deduction for student loan interest and adjust such increased amount for inflation for taxable years beginning after 2015.
